detail_desc: Short, straight-style dress in a viscose weave with wide, 3/4-length sleeves with a slit on top and ties at the cuffs. Unlined.
Skirts in soft cotton jersey, one with an all-over print. Covered elastication at the waist, gathers at the top and a decorative bow at the front. Unlined.

Jacket in soft, checked wool with narrow notch lapels, a decorative buttonhole and two buttons at the front. Chest pocket, flap front pockets and three inner pockets, one with a button. Decorative buttons at the cuffs and a double back vent. Lined. Slim fit that tapers at the chest and waist, which combined with slightly narrower sleeves creates a fitted silhouette.

Sleeveless lace dress with an opening with a button at the back of the neck, seam with narrow elastication and a decorative bow at the waist and a lace-trimmed hem. Jersey-lined bodice and sewn-in inner skirt.
Trainers with lacing at the front, fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Double-breasted coat in a cotton weave with notch lapels, welt front pockets with a flap, an inner pocket, buttons at the cuffs,and a single back vent. Lined.
Dungarees in narrow-striped cotton corduroy with flounce-trimmed shoulder straps, a seam at the waist with wide elastication at the back, side pockets and tapered legs.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric with a high elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and elasticated hems. Soft brushed inside.
Long-sleeved, straight-cut blouse in printed woven fabric with a slightly wider neckline and buttoned cuffs. Slightly longer at the back.
Briefs in soft jersey made from a cotton and viscose blend with a low waist, lined gusset, narrow sides and full coverage at the back.
Blouse in a viscose weave with a frill-trimmed grandad collar, frilled button placket, long sleeves and narrow, buttoned cuss with a frill trim.
Jumper in a fine-knit wool blend in a relaxed fit with dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Sleeveless top in sturdy, textured jersey with a visible seam down the front and a concealed zip at the back.
Leggings in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Long-sleeved top in soft viscose jersey with a unique nursing feature and ribbing around the neckline. The design includes a double layer to help retain warmth while allowing easier nursing access.
Padded gilet with a detachable, padded hood, stand-up collar and zip down the front. Lined.
Satin mules with pointed toes. Satin linings and insoles and rubber soles. Covered heels 6 cm.

Straight-cut shirt in denim made from Tencel™ lyocell with a collar and concealed buttons down the front. Flap chest pockets with a concealed press-stud, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and slits in the sides.
Short-sleeved Best Friend tops in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Jacket knitted in soft, thermal fleece with a hood, zip down the front with a chin guard, side pockets and jersey trims around the hood, pockets, cuffs and hem. The jacket is made partly from recycled polyester.
Wide blouse in pattern-weave viscose with trumpet sleeves, an opening at the front with a small frilled collar and ties at the top with tasselled ends. Flounces front and back.

Full-length, V-neck dress in heavily draping jersey with a slight sheen. Long shoulder straps that can be tied in various ways, elastication at the back of the waist and a raw-edge hem. Jersey lining.
5-pocket jeans in washed denim in a slightly looser fit with a high waist, button fly and straight legs.
Vest top in soft cotton jersey with a racer back and frill-trimmed chest pocket.
Running top in fast-drying functional fabric with taped details, a back section in ventilating mesh and long raglan sleeves with thumbholes at the cuffs.
Short lace dress with a V-neck, zip at the back, long sleeves, seam at the waist and flared skirt. Partly lined.
Wide headband in a soft, fine knit with a decorative knot at the front.
Jumper in a soft, fluffy knit with a high, ribbed collar and zip with a round pull at the top. Low dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves and wide ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Cropped, sleeveless top in smocked cotton jersey with narrow, bow-topped shoulder straps and overlocked edges at the top and bottom.
Long-sleeved dress in cotton jersey with a seam at the waist and bell-shaped skirt.
T-shirts in organic cotton jersey.
Short-sleeved top in soft viscose jersey with a wide neckline, elastication at the top and decorative buttons at the front. Elasticated seam at the waist and a flounce at the hem.

Set with a long-sleeved cotton jersey top and a skirt in a double layer of tulle. Top with a reversible sequin motif on the front (size 2-3Y with normal sequins). Skirt with a glittery elastic waistband. Lined.
Socks in a soft, jacquard-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
T-shirt in a striped cotton weave with slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Long-sleeved tops in soft cotton jersey.
Jumper in a fine, fluffy knit with dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Shorts in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, small print on one leg and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Long jersey dress with a lace bodice, wide neckline, concealed zip at the back and short cap sleeves.
Fitted vest top in soft cotton jersey with lace trims around the neckline and armholes.
Socks in a soft, jacquard-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
KELZUKI x H&M. Padded jacket in a patterned weave with a detachable, fleece-lined hood and a stand-up collar. Zip down the front with a chin guard and front pockets with a press-stud. Lined.
Fully lined, V-neck swimsuit with lightly padded cups and narrow adjustable shoulder straps.
Pool shoes in imitation leather with a print motif. Moulded insoles and patterned ethylene-vinyl acetate (EVA) soles.
High-waisted trousers in a sturdy viscose and linen blend with a sheen. Zip fly and hook-and-eye fastening, pockets in the side seams and straight, wide legs with creases.

Short, boxy jacket in water-repellent functional fabric with a stand-up collar that has a concealed zip with a fold-up hood inside. Zip down the front with a chin guard, front pockets, long raglan sleeves and covered elastication at the cuffs and hem. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Long-sleeved tops in soft jersey. The cotton content of the tops is organic.
Hi-tops with an adjustable hook and loop tab, elasticated lacing and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Lace push-up bra with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a narrow fastening at the back with two pairs of hooks and eyes.
Briefs in a double layer of mesh with a lined gusset and lace trims.
Calf-length, V-neck dress in woven fabric with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, buttons down the front, smocking at the back and a seam at the waist with a flared skirt. Lined.
Vest top in jersey crêpe with scalloped edges.
Fully lined, patterned bikini. Top with narrow shoulder straps and a wide flounce that can be worn in different ways. Matching bottoms.
Hipster briefs in cotton jersey with a lined gusset.
Small pouch bag in grained imitation leather with a zip at the top. Lined. Size approx. 12x17 cm.
Metal earrings with a round, hammered metal disc and metal chain securing a thin hoop and a round, patterned acetate pendant. Diameter 3.5 cm, length 5.5 cm.

Shirt in softly draping twill with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Open chest pocket, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
5-pocket jeans in soft, washed stretch denim with an adjustable elasticated waist, fly with a press-stud and slim legs.
Vest tops in soft cotton jersey with a scalloped trim around the neckline and armholes.
5-pocket trousers in washed, superstretch twill with a regular waist, zip fly and button and skinny legs.
V-neck jersey top with a small, gathered stand-up collar, and 3/4-length sleeves with narrow cuffs and a button.
Tube scarf in soft, rib-knit cashmere.

Single-breasted jacket in a lightweight weave with narrow notch lapels, a decorative buttonhole and two buttons at the front. Chest pocket, front pockets and two inner pockets, one with a button. Decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lining in woven fabric made from recycled polyester. Slim Fit – a fit that shapes in at the chest and tapers at the waist. This, combined with slightly narrower sleeves, creates a fitted silhouette.
Long-sleeved bodysuits in soft, organic cotton jersey with a wrapover front and press-studs at the side and crotch.
Top in ribbed jersey with a deep neckline and long sleeves.
Long-sleeved jersey tops made from organic cotton.
Pre-tied bow tie in a satin weave with an adjustable strap and fastening at the back. Width 11 cm.
Shorts in soft cotton twill with elasticated jersey ribbing and a drawstring at the waist, side pockets, one back pocket and a fake fly.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric made from an organic cotton blend with a lined hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Bucket bag in grained imitation leather with two handles and a drawstring at the top. Size 14x28x29 cm.
Long-sleeved shirts in woven fabric with a turn-down collar and chest pocket. Easy-iron finish.

Long cardigan in a soft rib knit containing some wool with twill shoulder patches and long sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Patch front pockets and a detachable belt with a metal fastener at the waist. The polyester content of the cardigan is recycled.
Socks in a soft, rib-knit wool blend.
Jeans in washed cotton denim with a high waist, zip fly and button, coin pocket, front and back pockets and a pocket on each leg. Loop at one side and straight legs.
Straight, ankle-length trousers in a viscose crêpe weave. Elasticated waist with a tasselled, twisted drawstring, diagonal side pockets and coconut shell buttons down the legs.

Long dress in a double layer of tulle with a deep V-neck front and back and narrow shoulder straps with pleats to create a draping effect at the top. Seam at the waist with pleats and a voluminous skirt with a seam and flounce at the hem. Concealed zip in one side. Jersey lining with a tulle flounce at the hem.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a motif, lined hood, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Fitted, knee-length dress in soft velour with a draped neckline, 3/4-length sleeves and a seam at the waist.
Long-sleeved jumper in soft, textured-knit cotton with stripes in different stitches and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short dress in airy plumeti organza with a deep V-neck and wrapover front. Seam at the waist with ties at the sides and short, raglan puff sleeves with narrow elastication. Lined.
